attributes.action: Ban all imports of Russian oil and gas immediately
attributes.additional_details:
The harsher the sanctions now, the more chance of a free Ukraine tomorrow. 
 
The Government should also call on the population to “Turn it Down for Ukraine”, and encourage people to turn down their thermostats to help save gas.
attributes.background: We want the UK Government to halt all gas and oil imports into the UK from Russia immediately, and put pressure on foreign counterparts to follow. End the hypocritical situation of sanctioning Russia while purchasing Russian gas.
